name: Falling Bot (PhobosRandom, SaussolNicolas)
description:
______________________________________________________________________________________________________

 Summary

You are a powered robot with low fuel, you need to avoid and destroy obstacles in order to land safely at the end of the cavern. Good luck !

 Controls

Activate left thruster -> Right arrow key

Activate right thruster -> Left arrow key

Activate both thruster -> Left + Right arrow key

 Disclaimer
  • All 3D models, textures, UI elements and scripts were made by our team.
  • We recommend you to used the downloadable .exe game, as the art and audio quality are better on it.

______________________________________________________________________________________________________

- Fixed credit scene responsivity.

- Fixed freeze on instruction screen. 

- Fixed Patrick monster damage deal. 

- Fixed thruster power inconstancy.

- Fixed block destruction delay inconstancy.

- Fixed fuel consumption inconstancy. 

- Fixed “Metter” specification to “Score”.

HTML5 Port | 27.04.21 2.0 | 28.04.21
